example.description: Few ways to positioning elements verticaly
example.source: <a:vbox height="150" width="100"> <a:button height="24" edge="5">Button 1</a:button> <a:button height="24" edge="5">Button 2</a:button> <a:button height="24" edge="5">Button 3</a:button> </a:vbox>

example.description: Few ways to positioning elements verticaly
example.source: <a:vbox height="150" lean="bottom" width="100"> <a:button height="24" edge="5">Button 1</a:button> <a:button height="24" edge="5">Button 2</a:button> <a:button height="24" edge="5">Button 3</a:button> </a:vbox>
